sentences.english: "It'll help you avoid mindless munching," she said.
sentences.chinese: “这帮助你避免了漫不经心的咀嚼”，她说。

sentences.chinese: 丛林里旅人漫不经心穿过的声音传到了动物的耳里。

sentences.english: He strums his guitar and sings, his voice so sweet that it's heartbreaking.
sentences.chinese: 他漫不经心地边弹边唱，声音如此甜美，令人心碎。

sentences.english: Byron quite casually said that he had 'a lot of Spenserian stanzas'.

sentences.english: He was sure that the casualness of the gesture was deliberate.
sentences.chinese: 他确信那似乎漫不经心的姿态是有意装出来的。

sentences.english: It is shame that there are so many people who waste their time carelessly.

sentences.english: This one Josephine did not dive into, she was unconcern for her part.

sentences.english: He idly plucked the strings of the lute.

definition: not in the least concerned (idiom)/reckless/couldn't give a damn about it/unperturbed/couldn't care less/harum scarum
not a word or movement (idiom); remaining calm and collected/not batting an eyelid
as if nothing had happened (idiom); calmly/nonchalantly
calm and unhurried (idiom); composed/to take matters calmly
to sketch in light shades/to play down/to deemphasize (idiom)
to be calm and unruffled in the midst of chaos or at a busy time (idiom)
